channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Edit Menu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Edit Menu

item.title: CVE-2022-2276|2024-08-03T00:32:09.597Z -- unknown -- wp%20edit%20menu
item.description: The WP Edit Menu WordPress plugin before 1.5.0 does not have authorisation and CSRF in an AJAX action, which could allow unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary posts/pages from the blog

item.title: CVE-2022-2275|2024-08-03T00:32:09.357Z -- unknown -- wp%20edit%20menu
item.description: The WP Edit Menu WordPress plugin before 1.5.0 does not have CSRF in an AJAX action, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin delete arbitrary posts/pages from the blog via a CSRF attack
